context: What kind of movies are looking for?
I just saw The Greatest Showman (2017) with my family. Can you recommend other movies like it for my family to watch?
I have seen that but my kids haven't. I forgot about that movie. That is a great idea! I need to watch it with them!
resp: Of course, a good family movie is Sam (1986)
